title: actual gameplay tips for loading screen
body:
during loading screen there will be some.......not so helpful advice or useless facts. so how bout we create our own gameplay tips for players that will be actually helpful. examples being:

* Jhin has a certain amount of shots before he can reload. plan accordingly so that you are not vulnerable during reload.
* Ashe's Hawkshot ability can target anywhere on the map. use it for when you need vision at a certain location that is too far away to ward.
* Draven gains glory upon catching his axe a certain number of times in a row without dropping it. keep an eye on it so you can get to it in time. 
* don't get greedy. recall when you are low on health or mana.
* the jungle is a dark and dangerous place. be sure to ward often.

disagree. I saw a tip that was along the lines of "champions have a short period of time during auto attacks in which they cannot move or respond, use this to your advantage" and it revolutionized how i harass in bot lane.
That tip isn't even correct about how the game works. Players can cancel autos and move at any time, it's just a question of whether or not the auto attack actually fired off.

Again, I'm paraphrasing so I'm definitely getting the specifics of it wrong. But it's still worthwhile. Anyone who is high elo knows that you should aim spells at people who are going to (or are) auto attacking a minion because it's harder for them to respond.
